carpet.rule.hopperLock.desc: locks all of the hoppers in the server
carpet.rule.serverContainerSync.desc: sync block entity container contents in server
carpet.rule.reloadPortalTicket.desc: reload nether portal tickets when server restarts
carpet.rule.endPortalChunkLoad.desc: entities go through end portal will load 3x3 chunk
carpet.rule.endGatewayChunkLoad.desc: entities go through end gateway portal will load 3x3 chunk
